segments.text: I see the woman facing away from the counter, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water pours from the sink, flooding everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepping in it, apron probably getting soaked soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on the stool, reaching like his life depends on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's unstable, legs splayed out awkwardly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's helping by distracting or just waiting her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is lovely, but inside it's a disaster waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing such carelessness in a home like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked high, cookies spilling outâ€”total anarchy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinets frame the boy's risky climb perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This makes me furious at the ignored dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn around, lady, before it's all ruined!
segments.speaker: PAR
